branchCategory.name: IDFB*E, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature for North America
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IDFB*E refrigerted air dryers are suitable for use in aftercooled systems with compressors up to ~100 hp (depending on dew point desired).&nbsp; These durable units have simple control systems and are easily serviced.</p>
